name: Hell of a Time.
description:
A small game inspired by Quick Man's stage and Clownpiece's Spell Card, Hell Sign 「Star and Stripe」.

You play as the time stopping maid to dodge those stars and lasers, throw knives and send the pierrot back to hell.

Good luck, have fun!

Controls Left ← Right → Up ↑ Down ↓ Select/Jump Z Cancel/Time X Warning

Colour inverting effects are used very often in this game.

Can be disabled if you don't like it. (Option > Time Effect)
